values: -Sighs softly- I found this site. I thought it would proove a point, but it didn't at all. I am worth $1,726,750.00. according to Human For Sale. Com. Though that seems all good and all...-pouts- The average male is worth $1,808,231.00. I bet Yuki-san will probably be one in the $3,000,000.00 or more category...;_; Am I Still worth more then your couch, anyways?

-sighs sadly, then yawns- Well it's eleven ninteen and the last time I saw Yuki-san was at 7:04 am before I left for the studio. I'm sitting here, dissapointed, listening to Nittle Grasper songs that remind me of Yuki and I -pouts- It's unfair. I couldn't wait to see Yuki today. I can't wait to see Yuki everyday. To be with him....see him..talk to him....watch him..-blushes softly, sighing again, sipping a half empty can of soda- I wish he would of came home, because now i'm worried because It's not like Yuki-san to be gone this long. Maybe his publisher just held him back for alittle while longer to read over the chapters of the story he had finished...-tries to convince himself- Yeah, thats it... -sings softly 'Predilection'- can't get enough kotoba yori mo motto don't let me down tashika ni misete hoshii one more night suka ni kizutsuita kimi ga mitsumeru me sono saki ni can't get enough, it's more than words don't let me down, i want it to be revealed one more night, even if a scar remains the eyes you look into were the first you saw can't get enough don't let me down one more night -sighs deeply once again- I've been so fidgity all night waiting for Yuki to come hope before I went to sleep. Now the time has come and he's not here. I feel so lonely.. -yawns tiredly- But now..i'm going to head to bed...alone....-sigh-

The studio was crazy today. We practiced for alittle while, but then...the souind system blew up ><. Not my fault! Really! ... Okay, so it was my fault -sighs- We where listening to some play backs, and I didn't hear anything, so I decided to turn the volume up. I kept turning it louder and louder but I couldn't hear anything. But the music wasn't playing so when they turned the music on, all you heard was a loud BOOOOOM!. I only heard a small boom, though. -pokes deaf ear for fun- We all sat around the studio watching people running around everywhere O_O. I tried to calm as possible. I knew everyone knew I did it, but i just tried to act like i knew everything was alright (Which I didn't!) -whines- I hope Yuki-san doesn't make fun of me for breaking Tohma-san's sound system... Though, tomorrow will be fun since we won't be getting the new system until wednesday we're going to be thinking up promotional idea's :D

I snaggled it from Yuki-sans journal. :D I'm at the studio and snuck onto the secretary of the studios computer -giggle-. I gotta hurry up before she comes back from running an errand.
I have issues with...
children
intelligence
discipline
excess
father
Take Word Association Test
-pouts- I have a problem...with..intelligence...-sighs- Yuki's right...

Well it's the morning and i'm a tad bit in a rush. Sorda -turns to see wall clock- two minutes late :D Yuki-san got his journal up and running ( Yuki ! ) and has it all fixed up. Well I gotta hurry up so I don't get yelled at for being late ^_^ Bye Bye!

I was listening to this song, so I decided to parodize it :3 -giggles- Hey Yuki!


Oh Yuki you're so fine! You're so fine you blow my mind,
Hey Yuki! Hey Yuki!

Oh Yuki you're so fine! You're so fine you blow my mind,
Hey Yuki! Hey Yuki!

Oh Yuki you're so fine! You're so fine you blow my mind,
Hey Yuki! 

---

Hey Yuki!
You've been writing all night, and that's alittle long,
You think you've got to write, but I think you've got it wrong.
Oh can't you stop tonight, and please don't be so cold, Yuki.

Cuz when you always yell, it always means you won't,
You're giving me the chills, Yuki, Please, Yuki don't.
Every night you still leave me all alone, Yuki.

---

Oh Yuki what a pity you don't understand, you take me by the heart when you take me by the hand.
Oh Yuki you're so pretty can't you understand,
It's guys like you, Yuki!
Oh what'cha do Yuki? Do Yuki? Don't break my heart, Yuki!

---

Hey Yuki!
Now when we show up on the news
everyones gonna know
Every time you're rude
I let my feelings show
Thats something that can't refuse
so don't say no, Yuki.

---

So come on
and give it to me
any way you can
any way you want to do it
I'll take you like a man (-giggle blush-)
Oh Please
Yuki, please
Don't leave me in the dam, Yuki

---

Oh Yuki what a pity you don't understand, you take me by the heart when you take me by the hand.
Oh Yuki you're so pretty can't you understand,
It's guys like you, Yuki!
Oh what'cha do Yuki? Do Yuki? Don't break my heart, Yuki!

---

Oh Yuki
you're so fine
you're so fine you blow my mind,
Hey Yuki,
Hey, Hey
Hey Yuki
Hey, Hey
X2

---

Oh Yuki what a pity you don't understand, you take me by the heart when you take me by the hand.
Oh Yuki you're so pretty can't you understand,
It's guys like you, Yuki!
Oh what'cha do Yuki? Do Yuki? Don't break my heart, Yuki!
x3

Your ideal Gravitation guy is Yuki! YOu better stay
away from him though. If you steal him away
from Shuichi I'll hunt you down. Shuichi's been
hurt enough, poor guy...

The Gravitation Dating Game
brought to you by Quizilla I AM Shuichi!
You are most like Shindou Shuichi! You're easy to
love, and everyone does, but you can sometimes
be high maitenance. You brighten the days of
everyone you meet with your friendly
personality and you're lucky to have so many
people who care about you like they do.

It's Gravitation! Who are you?
brought to you by Quizilla see! They know the truth! I AM Shuichi! ^_^

Last night, as Sakuma-san said there was a party ^.^ Well, there was going to be a party, but Yuki-san didn't want to go. -pouts- I, like usual had a hissy fit and took off (Gomen Yuki-san...) and ended up at Yuki's apartment. I guess Yuki knew I was going to be there because he found me within a few minutes. ^^; I got scolded a bit, but then -blushes- Yuki....Yuki-san forgave me quickly. I don't know what Tatsuha thinks Yuki-san is mean. He's just strict -giggles- he can be very nice to me..-Blushing brighter, he got off the topic quickly- When we got inside, Yuki had to go work. He wrote for awhile, but then I guess he got stuck and got frustrated. He stopped writing earlier then he normally would of because of this (Happy!). He was in a bad mood, though, because of getting writers block (sad..) I left him alone for alittle while but I got really stir-crazy, and got alittle Hyper. -Thinks about what happened and face turns tomator red- O_O;;;; -giggles embarrassingly- Then I kind of lost control of myself and something.....happened.....-Pokes fingers, looking down all embarrassed- Gomen Yuki....I....didn't know what I was doing...(Though, -giggles shyly- I did..enjoy it ^_^) -Ponders- Thats all I can think of right now n.n Gomen...

Today was a good day! Overcoming my handicap from my ear, we actually got some work done for a change!

Mr. K still hasn't appeared, maybe he's staying around Sakuma-san..-giggles- because I know he's been sneaking out from the studio alot lately. :D

During lunch break, I found three 1000 yen bills in my pocket so I stopped at the corner store and picked up two boxes of pocky. Now i'm content, and happily snacking on my favorite thing (-blushing softly, he smiled- Other then Yuki-san). Strawberry pocky to be precise.

I don't know how Yuki can say Pocky is not an actual food, as in, being a full meal. I love it, i could live on pocky! It is just sooooooooo good :D

-sighs, messing with the cartilage of his deafened ear- I don't know what else to tell.....-smiles brightly- But if I remember anything i'll come back n.n

Shuichi is tired, and feels like going to bed. I'm still adjusting to my ear, and have gotten the hang of it. No appointment yet, and K hasn't come back -sigh of relief- but there is always today...O_O. Sakuma-san help with my journal layout, as you all know, and I love it n.n Well, sleep-sleep time!
Nite Nite Yuki-san!

I wonder what Yuki would have to say about this...O_O

My life is rated G.
What is your life rated?

-jumps up and down happily- Sakuma-san helped me with my journal, now it is all nice. -smiles brightly- There's even a picture of me and Yuki at the top! I picked it out myself. Sakuma-san is so talented, I never knew he could do all of this stuff. I know Yuki-san can, but Ryuichi, too? -pouts- It makes me feel so stupid.

-snapping right back into his happyness, he smiled- I wonder what Yuki will think..I hope he'll like it. n.n

-whines- lately, I haven't been getting much sleep..I have to leave for the studio at seven and i've only slept for about three hours. I nearly didn't hear my alarm clock since I was laying on my good ear, and now i'm running late. ..no less...I still post in my journal.. There isn't a date for the doctor's appointment Yuki-san needs to take me to. It feels weird only having one ear. n.n -yawns and shivers- It is a tad bit chilly today...but alas, i'm not a morning person so it always seems that way around six in the morning when I wake up. Glad I stayed up till about three, I cought up with Sakuma-san. He offered us snacks, but half way there, I just couldn't stay awake anymore. The studio will be intresting today, I have to explain my ear -pouts- as well as me being exhausted. Maybe I won't have to work today...well..if K doesn't show up.. he's crazy...

Wow. no one could figure so much could happen in a few hours. But in my case, you can. Yuki-san is just so popular, we where at a public scene area and everyone seemed to know him...let alone like him -pouts- I wonder why he still puts up with me if he could have someone else....

During that, though, a friend of Yuki....popped my left ear drum so i'm deaf in it until Yuki takes me to the doctor. ;_; I don't know what i'm going to do. Especially when K returns back from wherever he magically dissapeared to. >_>

 Later, though, due to the deaf ear, I almost got ran over by a car when I wanted to go to the park for a walk. Like Yuki-san said, this isn't my week. -pouts-

-blinks confused- and it doesn't seem like my avatars are working. Going to fix that. >_> I think I need to make a default. Well, like my mood indicates, poor little me is tired. -yawns- Shu need some sleepy before he goes to the studio to work tomorrow. Hopefully K isn't there and I can get away another day. I'm really hoping because of my ear O_O I dun like Mr. K's guns.

I've finally worked on my journal. Yuki told me I need to, so I did. Today I worked in the studio, like always. Nothing different, the same old routine. K wasn't seen at all during recordings. I think that would be a good thing though, don't you? We didn't have to stand on the wrong side of his stupid gun. Today Yuki wasn't feeling so well, and I tried to cheer him up. -giggles- I told him to go to sleep, but he didn't. He was finishing a few chapters of his newest story and wanted to wait for the return phone call from his publisher. Today, right now, I have nothing more to post ^_^ -smiles- I'll post again if anything fun happens!
